children.text: The earth rod bonding conductor is visible above the concrete, indicating that it has been installed into the reinforcement.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3000 Wiring Rules states in section 5.6.2.5 that
‘Any conductive reinforcing within a concrete floor or wall forming part of a shower or bathroom shall be bonded to the earthing system of the electrical installation’ .
This item is to confirm that the earth bonding conductor has been installed, and there is no action required from the builder at this stage in relation to this item.
